publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3923# Scott Barrie: Longannet Power Station—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Power on its decision to fit Flue Gas Desulphurisation technology at Longannet Power Station in Kincardine; notes that the power station currently generates 25% of Scotland’s electricity; further notes that this decision will allow the burning of indigenous coal in full compliance with environmental legislation; welcomes nearly a quarter of a billion pounds investment and the creation of 300 construction jobs in Fife, and agrees that coal continues to have an important part to play in meeting Scotland’s energy needs.

S2M-3923# Longannet Power Station (lodged on 6 February 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Christine May*, John Home Robertson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Sarah Boyack*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Karen Gillon*, Bill Butler*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Karen Whitefield*, Helen Eadie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-3923# Longannet Power Station (lodged on 6 February 2006) Donald Gorrie*
